tool_description: Classifies transactions into spending categories and analyzes spending patterns across different categories for behavioral profiling.

transaction_descriptions.description: Array of transaction descriptions to classify

classification_model.description: Classification model to use: rule_based, machine_learning, or hybrid

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for category assignment (0.5-0.95)

error_messages: Empty descriptions: transaction_descriptions cannot be empty or contain only whitespace
Invalid model: classification_model must be one of [rule_based, machine_learning, hybrid]
Confidence threshold out of range: confidence_threshold must be between 0.5 and 0.95
Processing limit exceeded: Cannot process more than 1000 transactions in a single call
usage: Provide transaction_descriptions array and optionally specify classification_model and confidence_threshold for accurate category classification.

confidence_scores.description: Confidence score for each category assignment

category_distribution.description: Summary of spending distribution across categories

unclassified_count.description: Number of transactions that could not be classified
